content: free but please note that while you are welcome to this pattern as a free download this is for your personal use only you may not sell or distribute any part of this pattern or photographs as your own or use any of this copyrighted content for anything other than personal use without my consent you are welcome to sell the physical bookmark made from this pattern if you credit auburncraft crochet design as the designer and provide a link to the pattern thank you this pattern has been tested a great make for when you are in need of a small gift or token and only have 15 to 20 minutes of time super fast to make and they look great crochet terminology both us and uk this is a written pattern with photos and graph materials 6mm/j hook clover armour hook click here for clover armour hook aran weight yarn approx 20m/21 8yd used scrap yarn could be used for this scissors please add your finished photos as projects as i love to see your finished work https //auburncraftcrochet com/2020/02/29/moths-ate-my-flower-scarf/ https //www facebook com/auburncraft-crochet-103007401116090/ https //www facebook com/groups/703981100116431/
